<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/72775</entry>
  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>72775</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120196</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120196</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Odskakujoča žogica</string>
            <string language="en">A Bouncing Ball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Aufprallende Kugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Boule de Rebondissement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Esfera Saltando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una Sfera Di Rimbalzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αναπηδώντας σφαίρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Bola Que despide</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz razmerja potencialne, kinetične in prožnostne energije v posamezni fazi odboja žogice.</string>
            <string language="en">Visualization of ratio between potencial, kinetic and elastic energy in different moments of ball's bounce.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">potencialna energija</string>
            <string language="en">potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična energija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prožnostna energija</string>
            <string language="en">elastic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gibalna količina</string>
            <string language="en">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtbarmachung des Verhältnisses zwischen 
potencial, kinetischer und elastischer Energie in den 
unterschiedlichen Momenten des Schlags der Kugel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation de taux entre l'énergie potencial, 
cinétique et élastique dans différents moments du rebond de la 
boule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization da relação entre a energia 
potencial, cinética e elástica em momentos diferentes do salto da 
esfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione del rapporto fra energia 
potencial, cinetica ed elastica nei momenti differenti di rimbalzo 
della sfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση της αναλογίας μεταξύ της potencial, 
κινητικής και ελαστικής ενέργειας στις διαφορετικές στιγμές της 
αναπήδησης της σφαίρας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización de la relación de transformación 
entre la energía potencial, cinética y de elástico en diversos 
momentos de la despedida de la bola.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mögliche Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elastische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie potentielle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie élastique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">élan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia potencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia elástica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">momentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia potenziale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia elastica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">quantità di moto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πιθανή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαστική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía potencial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía de elástico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ímpetu</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
